messages.msgSnippet: Pam: Will do ... although I think it s inhumane to get my husband s hopes up once again just to dash them against the rocks :) Shelly
messages.messageBody:
Pam:

Will do ... although I think it's inhumane to get my
husband's hopes up once again just to dash them
against the rocks :)

Shelly

and humorous --
might be
a better fit!! Sorry I don't have the url - but you
can find it with a
google
search, I'm sure.

--pam>
